By using our Services, you agree to be bound by our Terms of Use. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and all activities that occur under your account. Unauthorized use of services is strictly prohibited. We reserve the right to terminate your access to the Services for violating these Terms.

We care about your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. We collect and use your information only to provide and improve our services. Your information will not be shared with third parties without your consent, except where required by law. You have the right to access, update or delete your personal information at any time.
